reviewText: PLEASE SAVE YOUR SELF THE HEADACHE - I SAW THIS MOVIE AND BOUGHT IT (NOTE IT IS ONLY FOR REGION 2 ) WHICH MEANS YOU PROBABLY WILL NOT WORK IN THE US -- THE DVD LOOKED DAMAGED AND DID NOT PLAY RIGHT - IT KEPT JUMPING FRAM TO FRAME --- THIS VENDOR WAS A BIT SNOTTY AND IT WAS SO AGGRAVATING I HAD TO ASK AMAZON TO DO AN  A TO Z . STAY AWAY FROM THEM ------- LOUIS CARUSO
